===print-json===
====multimethod====
_No usage documentation available_
<pre> Prints Clojure data types as JSON.  Nil becomes JSON null.
Keywords become strings, without the leading colon.  Maps become
JSON objects, all other collection types become JSON arrays.
Strings and numbers print as with pr.</pre>
